title: The Grey Hat Sales Technique That Builds Trust (before you ever pitch)
preview_text:
most sales pages start by listing features. "here's what you get. here's what it includes. here's why it's great."
then they wonder why conversion rates stay under 2%.
the problem isn't the product.
